full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Office Workspace Furniture

## Tender Details

* Tender Title: MA021-230191 - Office Workspace Furniture - Port aux Basques
* Tender Reference Number: WS4386840611-Doc4394738338
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS4386840611
* Publication Date: 2024-01-15
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-26T14:00:00 (cancelled)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-02-12
* Expected Contract End Date: None

## Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Entity and End User Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User: Marine Atlantic Inc. (MarineAtlantic)
* Address: 10 Fort William Place, St. John's, NL A1C 1K4, Canada

## Contact Information

* Contact Person: Melanie Gillis, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: melanie.gillis2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not available
* Fax: Not available

## Tender Description

Amendment 2 has been issued to cancel the solicitation. Marine Atlantic Inc. has a requirement for office furniture to be delivered and installed at Port aux Basques, NL by May 22, 2024. This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement. There is no security associated with the requirement.

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* Region of Opportunity: None
* Region of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador

## Tender Cancelled

This tender has been cancelled. Please note that the tender description and other details provided above may still be relevant for future tenders or other purposes. However, this tender is no longer active and will not be considered for evaluation or award.
